main event: A civilian reported sighting an unidentified object in the sky on 15 May 1955.
interesting points: The object was larger and brighter than planet Jupiter,The object was described as 75 to 100 feet in diameter and yellowish-white in color,The object was observed for 20 to 25 seconds at a speed of over 500 mph,There was no sound associated with the object's movement,The report indicates the object initially emitted a beam of light before becoming visible.
